Question
========
Which Agile event is used to synchronize team progress in an iterative development process?

Answerlist
----------
* Daily stand-up
* Sprint planning meeting
* Sprint retrospective
* Backlog grooming session
* Code review session
* Continuous integration checkpoint
* Deployment notification

Solution
========
Daily stand-up is a fundamental Agile event that allows the team to quickly share progress and align on the day's objectives.
